frontMatter.title: Markdown Guide
frontMatter.summary: Markdown cheatsheet for all your blogging needs - headers, lists, images, tables and more! An illustrated guide based on Github Flavored Markdown.

prev.title: The Time Machine
prev.summary: The Time Traveller (for so it will be convenient to speak of him) was expounding a recondite matter to us. His pale grey eyes shone and twinkled, and his usually pale face was flushed and animated...

next.title: Deriving the OLS Estimator
next.summary: How to derive the OLS Estimator with matrix notation and a tour of math typesetting using markdown with the help of KaTeX.
